nodes.name: getUserPolls

addNewPoll(string,string[],uint256).details: Example for deploying contract :     pollName: "What is your favorite colour ?",     options: ["Red", "Blue", "black", "Green"],     duration: 1  (poll will be active for 1 day).

params.duration: is the number of days for which poll will be active.
params.options: is an array of strings which contains options for poll.
params.pollName: is the name of Poll and it is a string. For example, "What is your favourite colour".

addNewPoll(string,string[],uint256).notice: This is the funtion where a user can create an instance of PollContract.

getUserPolls().notice: Function to return Polls propesed by msg.sender. Using this fumction, user gets         an array of instances deployed by him.

userdoc.notice: Following is the Factory Contract for PollContract. It deploys new PollContract         and store there addresses.
